title: Such mechanical / hydraulic / parking tower may be permitted touching the building on dead wall side
clause_text: Such mechanical / hydraulic / parking tower may be permitted touching the building on dead wall side. Provided that the dead wall must be 2 hours fire rated wall.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
